system.description: When you closely study a person, place, or thing, or when you attempt to research a subject, roll +Lore.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You learn nothing useful and your questions reveal your interest to someone who'd rather you stay ignorant.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You learn something useful. Ask one question from the list below.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You learn something useful. Ask up to two questions from the list below.

system.choices:
• What is the history of this place/person/thing?
• What here is not what it seems?
• What here is most/least valuable to me?
• Who or what is really in control here?
• What is hidden or concealed here?
• What should I be on the lookout for?
